# print('Yes')

n = int(input())
txy = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(1, n):
    t0, x0, y0 = txy[i-1]
    t1, x1, y1 = txy[i]
    dt = t1 - t0
    dx = abs(x1 - x0)
    dy = abs(y1 - y0)
    if dt < dx + dy:
        print('No')
        exit()
    elif dt % 2 != (dx + dy) % 2:
        print('No')
        exit()
print('Yes')

n = int(input())
txy = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(n)]
for i in range(n-1):
    t = txy[i+1][0] - txy[i][0]
    x = txy[i+1][1] - txy[i][1]
    y = txy[i+1][2] - txy[i][2]
    if (x + y) > t or (x + y + t) % 2 != 0:
        print("No")
        exit()
print("Yes")

N = int(input())
points = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(N)]

for i in range(1, N):
    t = points[i][0] - points[i-1][0]
    x = abs(points[i][1] - points[i-1][1])
    y = abs(points[i][2] - points[i-1][2])
    if t < x + y or (t - x - y) % 2 == 1:
        print("No")
        exit()

print("Yes")

n = int(input())
t = []
x = []
y = []

for i in range(n):
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    t.append(a)
    x.append(b)
    y.append(c)

for i in range(n):
    if (t[i+1] - t[i]) < (abs(x[i+1] - x[i]) + abs(y[i+1] - y[i])):
        print("No")
        exit()

print("Yes")

n = int(input())

t = []
x = []
y = []

for i in range(n):
    t_i, x_i, y_i = map(int, input().split())
    t.append(t_i)
    x.append(x_i)
    y.append(y_i)

# xとyの差分がtよりも大きい場合はFalse
for i in range(n):
    if (abs(x[i] - x[i-1]) + abs(y[i] - y[i-1])) > (t[i] - t[i-1]):
        print("No")
        break
# xとyの差分がtと同じか小さい場合はTrue
    else:
        if (i == n-1):
            print("Yes")
